text: Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova was the defending champion and successfully defended her title, defeating Madison Brengle in the final, 7–6(8–6), 7–6(7–3). == Seeds == == Draw == === Finals === === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== === Bottom half === ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== ==References== == External links == * Main draw Girls' Singles Australian Open, 2007 Girls' Singles
title: 2007 Australian Open – Girls' Singles
